Container.Name: Bigben-Discord
Container.Overview:
Big Ben Clock Discord-Bot is an self-hosted (useless) Discord Bot, that joins every Hour in an pre selected Voice channel, and plays the Big Ben Bells, to inform you, that you have entered an new Hour.
The Bot was Created by jamiesage123 and Dockerzied by me. (Kippenhof)
Github-Repo of the Bot: https://github.com/HOF-Clan/big-ben-clock-discord-bot-docker | Unraid-Template-Repo: https://github.com/Kippenhof/docker-templates
Container.Description:
Big Ben Clock Discord-Bot is an self-hosted Discord Bot, that joins every Hour in an pre selected Voice channel, and plays the Big Ben Bells, to inform you, that you have entered an new Hour.
The Bot was Created by jamiesage123 and Dockerzied by me.

Config.Name: BOT_TOKEN
Config.Description: Get an Bot-Token from the Discord Developer Portal and Enter it here

Config.Name: DATABASE_URL
Config.Description: Change the URL to your PostgreSQL host, to get it working
